vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Syrians living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.23;
son of: Aram (H0758);
brother of: Uz (H5780), Gether (H1666) and Mash (H4851)
§ Hul = "circle"
the second son of Aram and grandson of Shem
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Aram; descendiente de Sem
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
戶勒 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "圓圈"
亞蘭的第二個兒子, 閃的孫子
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
户勒 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "圆圈"
亚兰的第二个儿子, 闪的孙子
